name: Octo-Senpai: The Mutating Octopus.
description:
"Octo-Senpai: The Mutating Octopus." is a Vampire Survivors alike in which the player takes on the role of an octopus who is going about his day, minding his own business, when he is suddenly told by the king dragon that his existence is "bugged" because he is constantly mutating.

At first, the octopus is confused and doesn't understand what this means. But then he meets his "senpai," a wise and experienced octopus who tells him that his mutations are actually superpowers, and that he should embrace them and use them to protect himself and others.

As the octopus progresses through the game, he encounters various enemies, who drop crystals as they are defeated. Each time the octopus collects some of those crystals, he mutates further, gaining new and more powerful superpowers.

As the game progresses, the octopus must use his growing arsenal of superpowers to defend himself and others from the invading enemies, and ultimately save the day.

How to play?

Move - WASD

Close the Game - Alt + F4

Used Assets

  • Free
    • Fishes And Underwater Environment Set ( https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/fishes-and-underwater-environment-set-123678 )
    • Stylized 3D Gun ( https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/guns/stylized-3d-gun-184995 )
    • Simple Gems ( https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/simple-gems-ultimate-animated-customizable-pack-73764 )
    • Ground Texture by textures.com
  • Paid
    • Monsters Ultimate Pack 02 Cute Series
    • Game Music: RPG Battle Themes from Game Dev Market

Created assets

The 2D avatars where created using MidJourney.
The intro music is composed by myself.
